Summary: sky blobs dark various colors 5-15K ft, changing shape
divs: sighting details3 times similar events, 2-4 people per time, each time 2- 4 minutes, the objects were always the same makeup, apx 5 people total ��� same 2-3 people repeated, at night each time, in town, there were street lights on each block in view around us, dates unknown only that the 3 times were between 88 & 92, 2 times were within weeks of each other in the late winter or early winter cause it was really cool to cold but not really cold, mostly empty streets- no others in the area, for the most part there was never any structure or details to the blobs, they had the universal makeup or a embetween of gas cloud and soft egg shaped sponge, 1st time -maybe 3 people watching, maybe 2-4 minutes, 2 hovered at about 3-6,000ft next to each other, off an on changed shape as fast as about 5- 10seconds, but the 3rd one stayed near them flying around, but went across the sky at least once, then later it flew off out site at maybe 4-8,000 ft, the speed varied sometimes hovering sometimes as fast as a rocket from me to half way across the sky -so traveling maybe 10 miles, at the same elevation apx, time 5 to 20 seconds (maybe 30 max) in maybe at max speed of 2,400mph. (so 15 seconds traveling 10 miles =) (600 miles per hr = 6 seconds = 1 mile), it maybe had some of a energy stream behind it or more like residual image , they looked like dark colored blobs- one blue one orangish one green, against a dark sky, very hard to see sometimes, nothing effected them and they effected nothing, little or no feelings of anything, apx size maybe a inch wide 2 nd date, a few week later��� 2-3 people similar, but only one, was stationary (probably) the other one flew around a lot, after a minute or two 1 came in at maybe 20,000ft very fast from sorta in front of us to our area from too far away to see, then another one just behind it but harder to see that one, part of the time the one above us changed shape into a apx saucer with a big dome on top type shape, i think one faded away one flew of with another and not sure what happened to the 3 & fourth one anymore 3rd date ��� maybe a year later maybe only 1-2 1 was maybe there maybe not it \ object was too dark to tell, the 2nd one was only visible a few seconds off and on over 3-8 minutes, i was with another non relative guy who first saw it and saw it better than i did at first then by the time i saw it maybe 30 seconds later it was darker and harder to see but closer to us, maybe 10,000ft maybe 15 degrees down from the middle of the sky,
